title: Postmaster Disaster, Ellen’s Ex Elaborates? 8.18.20
itunes:title: Postmaster Disaster, Ellen’s Ex Elaborates? 8.18.20
description:
In episode 696, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by Creature Feature host Katie Goldin to discuss more of the USPS being screwed over, Trump promoting the OAN network, Lara Trump's dumb thoughts on Joe Biden picking Kamala Harris as a running mate, The Office's Leslie David Baker sharing the racist messages he received, Anne Heche's thoughts on the Ellen saga, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Two Democrats call for criminal inquiry of postmaster general
  2. Warren calls on McConnell to bring Senate back to address Postal Service
  3. Meet OAN, the little-watched right-wing news channel that Trump keeps promoting
  4. Lara Trump says Joe Biden is 'pandering for votes' and 'playing identity politics' by selecting a female running mate in Kamala Harris
  5. The Office's Leslie David Baker Victim of Racist Trolling After Launching 'Uncle Stan' Campaign
  6. ‘The Office’ Star Leslie David Baker Has Revealed Why He Shared The Racist Messages He Receives
  7. Anne Heche Speaks Out About Ex Ellen DeGeneres’s Alleged Staff Abuse
  8. WATCH: Aaliyah - Rock The Boat (Unreleased Kaytranada Edition)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
